typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empsrc
source(output(
		Deptno as string,
		Dname as string,
		Loc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> deptsrc
empsrc, deptsrc join(empsrc@DEPTNO == deptsrc@Deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> empdeptjoin
empdeptjoin sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empdeptdemo.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		Deptno = deptsrc@Deptno,
		Dname,
		Loc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> empdeptoutput

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees split(equals(DEPTNO, '10'),
	equals(DEPTNO, '20'),
	equals(DEPTNO, '30'),
	disjoint: false) ~> dept10@(sdept10, sdept20, sdeptn30)
dept10@sdept10 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['spdept10.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
dept10@sdept20 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['spdept20.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
dept10@sdeptn30 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['spdept30.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3

source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empdept10
empdept10 filter(equals(DEPTNO, '10')) ~> empdept
empdept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empdept10.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkemp

source(output(
		EMPNO as integer,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as integer,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employees
employees select(mapColumn(
		Id = EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		SAL,
		DEPTNO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectedcols
Selectedcols sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['empselect.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
